params.name: test_dataset
params.description: Dataset to run the predictions on. If it is a Dataset, columns not accepted by themodel.forward() method are automatically removed. Has to implement the method __len__

params.name: ignore_keys
params.description: A list of keys in the output of your model (if it is a dictionary) that should be ignored whengathering predictions.

params.name: metric_key_prefix
params.description: An optional prefix to be used as the metrics key prefix. For example the metrics bleu will be namedeval_bleu if the prefix is eval (default)

params.name: max_length
params.description: The maximum target length to use when predicting with the generate method.

params.name: num_beams
params.description: Number of beams for beam search that will be used when predicting with the generate method. 1 means nobeam search.
